GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of a specific topic

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/.description: serves an array of all articles!

articles.author: butter_bridge
articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

articles.author: butter_bridge
articles.title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: gets a comments for specific article

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: post a comments for specific article

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes today I AM NEW.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: changes votes for specific article, E.G takes votes from 100 to 102

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes today I AM NEW.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.exampleResponse: expect 204, there will be no response as will not recieve response body

GET /api/users.description: provides an array of all users
